WRITING.TEXT:
Those numbers are insane. First - averaging a double double is impressive by itself. Secondly, both PG's averaged double doubles, and third - Stockton's assist numbers are unbelievable.
Sometimes I don't think people realize how incredible Stockton's assist numbers are.
No problem! I am excited for it!

WRITING.TITLE: Foodie Fest Las Vegas
WRITING.TEXT:
Is anybody going to Foodie Fest in Las Vegas in a couple of weeks?
It would be fun to try and get a group together if anybody else is coming!
I found [cheap tickets online for $8](https://on.spingo.com/e/great_american_foodie_fest?aa=sping705 cc=reddit) if anybody else is wanting to come! It's April 28th - May 1st.

WRITING.TITLE: Facebook stock photos with carousel ads
WRITING.TEXT:
I am trying to create a carousel ad using the free stock photos that Facebook provides - however the option doesn't even appear to select stock photos when I select "Multiple images in one ad".
Has anybody had this same problem? Facebook's own page says I should be able to use stock photos for the carousel ads: https://www.facebook.com/business/a/carousel-stock-photo.
Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

WRITING.TITLE: How do I get more engagement on Facebook?
WRITING.TEXT:
I work for a growing startup, and we are pretty new on social media. I am wondering how to improve engagement on Facebook. We have doubled our followers, but our engagement hasn't increased at all.
What are your tips for improving engagement?

WRITING.TEXT: No problem! Glad I could help!
Yes, it is the McKay Music Library. It is literally right next to a UTA bus stop as well, so it is very convenient if you want to get somewhere quickly.
If you are looking for something quiet, there is the Libby Gardner library that is perfect for studying. It's my personal favorite place.
I've never been before, but they seem cool. I guess I'll have to see what I think afterwards!

WRITING.TITLE: Midway Ice Castles
WRITING.TEXT:
I just bought some tickets to the Midway Ice Castles and got them for a really good price so I thought I'd share the link if other people are interested in going. I got them through the Spingo app and they were 50% off, plus $10 off for a first time purchase through it, so two tickets were $1.20.
Here's the link for anybody who wants to go. https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/spingo-events/id1001258566?mt=8

WRITING.TITLE: 30 events in the U.S. worth traveling to in 2016

WRITING.TEXT: This is exactly what I was looking for. This is great stuff. I often feel second round draft picks are overvalued.

WRITING.TITLE: What's the value of a 2nd round pick?
WRITING.TEXT:
What is the value of a 2nd round draft pick? I am a Jazz fan and we have collected about 7 second round draft picks over the next few years, and I am not very thrilled about it.
Originally I was excited that we could use some of them to trade for a player, but it doesn't look like we are going to be doing that. For all the extra contracts we took on to acquire these 2nd round picks, it looks like we will just be sending players over to Europe for the most part - which seems like a waste of a trade to me.
So what is the value of a second round pick, and is my opinion wrong in this case?
